master.commit_message:
ci: lcitool: Maintain project package deps lists here

Each respective project that lcitool knows about and currently
maintains its list of package dependencies knows best what packages
they actually depend on. If a new dependency is currently needed,
first a change in lcitool is necessary before GitLab jobs and
containers can be updated. Provided a mapping already exists in
lcitool (which can quickly be added as an override via mappings.yml
temporarily) we speed up the whole CI update process by one step.

Note that starting this commit lcitool must be invoked as
    '$ lcitool -d/--data-dir ci/lcitool ...'
to pick up the project dependency list correctly.

Signed-off-by: Erik Skultety <eskultet@redhat.com>

Fix ocamlopt and ocamldoc detection

Signed-off-by: Jerry James <loganjerry@gmail.com>

README: Update project URI

The project has now it's own subdomain.

Signed-off-by: Peter Krempa <pkrempa@redhat.com>

web: Don't link to gitlab tags as release

I've originally added the link to gitlab tags as source of releases
based on:

https://gitlab.com/libvirt/libvirt-ocaml/-/issues/3#note_1292266414

In a discussion on the libvir-list:

https://listman.redhat.com/archives/libvir-list/2023-March/238761.html

the consensus became that using gitlab's generated archives as releases
is sub-optimal as they can change and can't be signed. Releases should
really be uploaded to something static.

Undo the link to gitlab. Note that the outstanding releases still need
to be uploaded to download.libvirt.org

Signed-off-by: Peter Krempa <pkrempa@redhat.com>

Makefile: Use 'download.libvirt.org' to upload the tarball

In the future 'download.libvirt.org' may become separate from
libvirt.org. Prepare for the occasion.

Signed-off-by: Peter Krempa <pkrempa@redhat.com>

Makefile.am: Drop makefile support to upload webpage

The web page is now generated via gitlab pages so it doesn't need to be
done as part of the release.

Signed-off-by: Peter Krempa <pkrempa@redhat.com>

Use 'libvirt.org' instead of 'www.libvirt.org'

Signed-off-by: Peter Krempa <pkrempa@redhat.com>

Remove accidentally-added vim swapfile web/.index.html.swp

Signed-off-by: Peter Krempa <pkrempa@redhat.com>

Add webpage and publish it via gitlab pages

Add web page originally hosted at https://www.libvirt.org/ocaml/ ,
include the generated documentation and publish it via gitlab pages.

The original index.html was slightly modified to point to the correct
repository and resources.

Signed-off-by: Peter Krempa <pkrempa@redhat.com>

ci: Regenerate with latest lcitool

Signed-off-by: Peter Krempa <pkrempa@redhat.com>

ci: update to latest lcitool manifest

This:

 * replaces Fedora 35 with Fedora 37
 * marks most jobs as interruptible so a new pipeline can
   auto-cancel any old pipeline on the same MR / brach

Signed-off-by: Daniel P. Berrangé <berrange@redhat.com>
